profile_credentials_empty: Profile credentials are empty. Please edit the profile and verify your credentials.
profile_host_empty: The profile host field is empty. Please verify the configuration.
profile_load_unexpected_error: Unexpected error while loading the profile: {}
profile_not_found: Configuration for profile '{}' was not found.
detector_info: Detect and manage drives mounted by rclone on this computer.
no_drives_detected:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Press "Detect Mounted Drives" to scan...

This will show all V:, W:, X:, Y:, Z: drives
that are currently mounted by rclone.
open_drive_tooltip: Open the mounted drive directly in File Explorer.
mount_info:
Turn your bucket into a local disk you can browse.

Recommended flow:
1. Choose the drive letter and bucket.
2. Click "Mount as Drive".
3. Use "Open Drive" to jump into File Explorer.

Tips:
- Unmount the drive before shutting down or disconnecting.
- If access fails, detect drives again and remount.
sync_info:
Keep a local folder mirrored with your bucket in real time.

Tips:
- Pick a dedicated folder to avoid syncing temp files.
- Leave the app abierta or in background while syncing.
- Check the log to confirm which files were uploaded.
folder_monitor_tooltip: Select the local folder you want to monitor. Changes in this folder will automatically sync to your bucket.
sync_control_tooltip: Start or stop real-time synchronization. When active, any changes in the monitored folder are automatically uploaded.
activity_log_tooltip: Shows the history of synchronized files. You will see which files have been uploaded and when.
detector_tooltip: Scans and shows all virtual drives (V-Z) that you have mounted with rclone. You can unmount them individually or all at once.
mount_config_tooltip: Select the drive letter where you want to mount your storage. It will appear as a local disk on your PC.
mount_actions_tooltip: Manage the mounted drive: mount it, open it in Explorer, or unmount when finished.
format_warning:
This will delete ALL files in the selected bucket.

Recommendations:
- Double-check the bucket name before continuing.
- Make a backup if you need to keep any data.
- Do not close the app while the process is running.

This action cannot be undone.
status_components_ready: All components ready. You can continue.
status_install_finished: WinFsp installed. Close and reopen the app to mount drives.
status_install_failed: WinFsp install failed. Run INSTALAR_WINFSP.bat manually.
status_install_cancelled: Installation cancelled or requires administrator approval.
drive_not_ready: Drive {} is not accessible. Mount it again and try once more.
send_to_background_tooltip: Hide the window and keep the app running in the notification area.
close_without_unmount_tooltip: Close the app without unmounting the currently mounted drives
background_running_message: Vultr Drive Desktop will keep running in the background. Use the tray icon to restore or exit.
background_notification: The application remains active in the background.
confirm_exit_text:
Are you sure you want to exit?
All drives will be unmounted.
sync_running_text: Real-time sync is still active. Do you want to stop it before closing?
drive_still_mounted_text: A drive is still mounted. Do you want to unmount it before closing?
language_changed_message:
Language changed to {}.

Please restart the application to see all changes.
mount_error_text: The drive could not be mounted
select_folder_to_monitor: Please select a folder to monitor.
close_without_unmount_message: Application closed. Mounted drives remain active.
no_buckets_available: No buckets available. Please create one first.
dialog_select_backup_directory: Select the directory to back up
backup_no_files: No files found in the selected folder.
select_bucket_to_mount: Please select a bucket to mount.
select_drive_letter_text: Choose a drive letter before attempting to unmount.
format_bucket_confirm_text:

You are about to DELETE ALL FILES in the bucket:

This action is PERMANENT and CANNOT be undone.

Are you sure you want to continue?
format_bucket_final_confirm_text: Type the bucket name '{}' to confirm deletion:
confirm_unmount_all_text:
Do you want to unmount ALL mounted drives?

This will stop rclone processes and unmount drives V:, W:, X:, Y:, Z:.
Open files from these drives will be closed.
tray_running_notification: The application keeps running in the system tray
settings_startup_info: When enabled, VultrDrive Desktop will launch automatically when Windows starts.
settings_notifications_info: Receive alerts when drives are mounted/unmounted, sync completes, and more.
settings_warning_all_fields: All fields are required to save a profile.
settings_confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete the profile '{}'?
notify_connection_lost_message: Connection to the server was lost. Retrying...
notify_connection_restored_message: The connection to the server has been restored
notify_app_started_message: Application started and ready to use
notify_winfsp_installed_message: WinFsp installed successfully. You can mount drives now.
notify_winfsp_failed_message: WinFsp could not be installed. Please install it manually.
error_start_message: An error occurred while initializing the application.
drive_unmount_not_mounted: Drive {}: is not mounted or already unmounted
drive_unmount_no_process:
Could not unmount drive {}:
No associated rclone process found.
Try using 'Unmount All' or restart the application.
drive_unmount_incomplete:
Could not completely unmount drive {}:
The process was terminated but the drive still responds.
Try closing open files and use 'Unmount All'.
